lib/hope/tuple/tuple_from_struct_unsafe.h

00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/tuple/flat_tuple.h"
00012 #include "hope/tuple/detect_fields_count.h"
00013 #include "hope/typelist/type_list.h"
00014 #include "hope/components/loophole.h"
00015 
00020 namespace hope {
00021     namespace detail{
00022 
00023         template <typename T>
00024         constexpr T construct_helper() noexcept {
00025             return {};
00026         }
00027 
00028         template <typename Struct, std::size_t I>
00029         struct any_convertible_s {
00030 
00031             using struct_t = std::decay_t<Struct>;
00032 
00033             template <typename Row>
00034             constexpr operator Row () const noexcept {
00035                 using clean_t = std::decay_t<Row>;
00036                 loophole::inject<I>(struct_t{}, Row{});
00037                 return construct_helper<clean_t>();
00038             }
00039         };
00040 
00041         template<typename... Ts>
00042         constexpr auto tuple_from_type_list(type_list<Ts...>) {
00043             return flat_tuple<Ts...>{};
00044         }
00045 
00046         template <typename T, std::size_t... Is>
00047         constexpr auto extract_types(std::index_sequence<Is...> sequence) {
00048             constexpr T object{ any_convertible_s<T, Is>{}... };
00049             (void)object;
00050             return type_list<decltype(loophole::get<Is>(std::declval<T>()))...>{};
00051         }
00052     }
00053 
00054     template <typename T>
00055     constexpr auto make_tuple() {
00056         constexpr auto fields_count = detect_fields_count<T>();
00057         constexpr auto types = detail::extract_types<T>(std::make_index_sequence<fields_count>());
00058         auto tuple = detail::tuple_from_type_list(types);
00059         return tuple;
00060     }
00061 
00062     template <typename T>
00063     auto tuple_from_struct_unsafe(const T& object) {
00064         constexpr auto tuple = make_tuple<T>();
00065         (T&)tuple = object;
00066         return tuple;
00067     }
00068 }
